article_title: Rick Santorum on Rival Ted Cruz
article_text:

article_metadata.news_keywords: rick santorum, rival, ted cruz, divisive

og.description: Republican presidential candidate Rick Santorum told Newsmax TV on Tuesday that he targeted rival Ted Cruz in his recent television ad because the Texas senator has "a pretty-strong record of not accomplishing things and being very divisive."
og.title: Rick Santorum on Rival Ted Cruz: 'Very Divisive'
